pacmangameplay.mazedisplay
Class Maze

java.lang.Object
  pacmangameplay.mazedisplay.Maze

public class Maze
extends java.lang.Object

This class displays and updates the maze. The maze is an ArrayList. The types of the tiles are in integer form: 0 wall 1 path 2 dot 3 energizer
